Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
OpenCms is a Java servlet supporting Java Server Pages (JSP). As a default, the standard JSP libraries as well as the OpenCms specific tag library and expression language are supported by the OpenCms servlet:

  • JSTL core tags
  • JSTL formatting tags
  • JSTL functions
  • OpenCms taglib
  • OpenCms expression language
